'''Joseph Jason Namakaeha Momoa''' (born August 1, 1979) is an American actor best known for his roles as {{w|Arthur Curry (DC Extended Universe)|Aquaman}} in films such as {{w|Justice League (film)|Justice League}} and {{w|Aquaman (film)|Aquaman}}.

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
{{Main|Movie:Garrett Garrison}}
Jason Momoa is best known in the ''Minecraft'' franchise for his role in ''[[A Minecraft Movie]]'' as [[Garrett  Garrison|Garrett "The Garbage Man" Garrison]]. He was revealed to be starring in the film in April 2022,<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/minecraft-movie-jason-momoa-1235131605/|title=Jason Momoa to Star in 'Minecraft' Movie for Warner Bros.|author=Aaron Couch|website=The Hollywood Reporter|date=April 18, 2022}}</ref><ref>[https://deadline.com/2024/01/minecraft-jennifer-coolidge-1235795092/ Warner Bros‚Äô Jason Momoa ‚ÄòMinecraft‚Äô Movie Finds Gem In Jennifer Coolidge] ‚Äì Deadline Hollywood; January 17, 2024</ref> and later appeared in a promotional video for the [[15 Days of Minecraft]] along with [[Jack Black]], teasing the film.<ref>{{tweet|Minecraft|1791498561789583419|Crafting kick axe memories since '09. #Minecraft15<br><br>Here‚Äôs to what's next. ‚öîÔ∏è|May 17, 2024}}</ref><ref>{{ytl|-zoMBvDjjFI|Stuck in the 80s. Huge fan of pink. Looks good. Could use a hug.|Warner Bros. Pictures|November 19, 2024}}</ref> Prior to the release of the film, the ''Minecraft'' Instagram account released unique artwork of his role as Aquaman, in a show of good faith in the actor.<ref>{{Cite Instagram|minecraft|C1LF1Opvl0O|Congratulations on the release of your new movie this week Jason Momoa / @prideofgypsies<br><br>We want more Momoa! üëÄ|December 22, 2023}}</ref>
